fiedls.name: Prefixes
fiedls.value: Added the ability to change the prefixes of the bot.

fiedls.name: Poll and Strawpoll
fiedls.value: Added the ability to create a poll and strawpoll.

fiedls.name: Help
fiedls.value: Added the ability to see the help of each command.

fiedls.name: Rock Paper Scissors
fiedls.value: Added the ability to play Rock Paper Scissors.

fiedls.name: Weather
fiedls.value: Added the ability to get the weather of a city.

fiedls.name: Apod
fiedls.value: Added the ability to get the Astronomy Picture of the Day.

fiedls.name: Case Sensitive
fiedls.value: Now the commands are case sensitive, you no longer have to worry if you misspell in capital letters.

fiedls.name: Top Songs
fiedls.value: Added the ability to get the most played song of the bot.

fiedls.name: TinyURL
fiedls.value: Added the ability to shorten your url.

fiedls.name: Version
fiedls.value: Added the ability to get the news about a version of the bot.

fiedls.name: Guess Game
fiedls.value: You can now play the guess game.

fiedls.name: Hangman
fiedls.value: The hangman game is now available.

fiedls.name: 8 Ball
fiedls.value: The 8 ball game is now implemented.

fiedls.name: Coin Flip
fiedls.value: Now you can flip a coin.

fiedls.name: Slash Commands
fiedls.value: Now you can to use slash commands.

fiedls.name: Shuffle and Loop Commands
fiedls.value: Shuffle and loop commands are added to the bot.
